plot: This gritty, realistic raw & intense Drama follows two brothers that look to escape town with no money & no vehicle after getting involved in a life changing hit & run accident.
title: Fratello
plot_es: This gritty, realistic raw & intense Drama follows two brothers that look to escape town with no money & no vehicle after getting involved in a life changing hit & run accident.
plot_en: This gritty, realistic raw & intense Drama follows two brothers that look to escape town with no money & no vehicle after getting involved in a life changing hit & run accident.
